cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing failure and prevent the security module from initializing properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting nb_tx to 10, which exceeds the valid range for transmit antennas (typically 1-4), will cause radio unit configuration failure and prevent proper hardware initialization.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nb_tx 設定為 10，超出發射天線的有效範圍（通常為 1-4），會導致無線單元配置失敗，並阻止正確的硬體初始化。
